email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.75 per ton. The laycan is currently set for October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. $48.75 is more in line with our expectations. We can proceed with this rate. Could you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate works for you. The demurrage rate is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage terms are acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm the final details, and we’ll arrange for the necessary paperwork. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll confirm the booking with the owner and send you the final confirmation shortly. The laycan remains October 20-25, and the freight rate is confirmed at $48.75 per ton. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
